long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the Relevate browser extension, you have the ability to identify interests and shared similarities with any LinkedIn profile, for example, comparing educational background, work experience, and professional activities.  Use these insights to Relevate your network and power up your sales process by personalizing your pitch or solution, building relationships, and closing the deal!
